Author: not_mr_hunnybunny
Text: He sounds like a complete shit and in the long run you'll be glad he's out of your life. I'm sorry you're starting the new year in such a crappy way ☹Hope it gets better quickly!

Author: in-a-quandary
Text: I’m sorry :( I’ve seen a good couple posts like this across social media and it’s saddening. If he left you during a holiday when you and him are supposed to be celebrating and on top of the world he wasn’t worth it. Stay safe.
